meanings.definition: A decorative structure above a fireplace.
meanings.sent1: The overmantel above the fireplace was beautifully carved with intricate designs.
meanings.sent2: The overmantel added a touch of elegance to the fireplace.
meanings.sent3: The overmantel above the fireplace seemed to have a secret compartment for hiding treasures.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an overmantel, brightening up the room with warmth and charm.
meanings.sent5: The overmantel stood tall, commanding attention with its grandeur and beauty.

meanings.definition: To cover or decorate the area above a fireplace.
meanings.sent1: She decided to overmantel the space above the fireplace with a large mirror.
meanings.sent2: The family chose to overmantel the area with family photos and artwork.
meanings.sent3: He playfully suggested overmanteling the fireplace with fairy lights for a magical touch.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to overmantel the room, filling it with joy and light.
meanings.sent5: The flowers overmanteling the fireplace brought a burst of color to the room.
